name: Go SLAP Yourself
description:
CONTROLS:

A : Slap left

ENTER : Slap Right

R: Restart

HOW TO PLAY:

The SLAPfest has begun! It's time for you to SLAP yourself. You get a point each time you slap yourself. See how many points you can get. BUT DONT MISS! Each time you do, you get a strike! Three strikes and you are out.

Made for Moo Moo Jam 2021

Theme: You are your own enemy
